knimeNode.name: Google Analytics Connector (deprecated)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a connection to the Google Analytics API.

p.b: Note: Google has discontinued Universal Analytics and has replaced it with Google Analytics 4. This node does not work anymore since July 2024. Please use the new Google Analytics Connector node.

intro.p: Create a connection to the Google Analytics API (Universal Analytics), given a Google API connection.

tab.name: General Settings
tab.option: The profile ID that will be used for this connection.

tab.name: Advanced Settings
tab.option: Timeout in seconds to establish a connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.
Timeout in seconds to read data from connection or 0 for an infinite timeout.

ports.inPort: The Google API connection that will be used.
ports.outPort: A connection that can be used to access the Google Analytics API.
